sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import sectiondata from '../../data/sections.json'; import parse from 'html-react-parser'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class Question extends Component { render() { let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/' let imagealt = 'image' let data = sectiondata.question return
{ data.title }

{ data.subtitle }

{ data.items.map( ( item, i ) =>

{ item.question }

Solution: { parse (item.answer) }

) }
} } export default Question
